titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to increase the minimum Government-wide goal for procurement contracts awarded to small business concerns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 1/25/2002--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to increase the Government-wide goal for procurement contracts awarded to small businesses owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans, qualified HUBZone small businesses, and small businesses owned and controlled by socially and economically disadvantaged individuals or women to 25 percent (currently 23 percent) of the total amount of Federal procurement contracts awarded in a fiscal year.
